hero.title: Welcome to Poodle & Co.
hero.description: Where compassion meets excellence in ethical poodle breeding. We're dedicated to raising healthy, happy puppies and matching them with loving families.

items.title: Ethical Breeding
items.description: We prioritize the health and well-being of our dogs above all else, following the highest ethical standards.

items.title: Health Guarantee
items.description: All our puppies come with comprehensive health testing and a lifetime of support for their families.

items.title: Loving Homes
items.description: We carefully match each puppy with the perfect family to ensure a lifetime of happiness together.

gallery.title: Happy Families
gallery.description: See the joy our puppies bring to their forever homes

preview.name: Sarah & Michael
preview.text: We couldn't be happier with our puppy from Poodle & Co. The entire process was professional, caring, and transparent. Our little one is healthy, happy, and has the sweetest temperament!

preview.name: Jennifer L.
preview.text: The care and attention to detail is remarkable. They truly love their dogs and it shows in every interaction. Our poodle is not just a pet, but a beloved family member.

cta.title: Ready to Welcome a New Family Member?

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.subtitle: A family dedicated to ethical breeding and the love of poodles

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Poodle & Co. began over a decade ago with a simple love for these intelligent, affectionate, and beautiful dogs. What started as a passion has grown into a commitment to ethical breeding practices and finding perfect matches between puppies and families.

We believe that breeding should prioritize health, temperament, and the overall well-being of our dogs. Every puppy born at Poodle & Co. is raised in our home, surrounded by love and socialization from day one.
Our mission is to continue the legacy of responsible breeding while building lasting relationships with the families who welcome our puppies into their homes.

items.title: Health First
items.description: Comprehensive health testing for all breeding dogs and puppies to ensure the healthiest possible start to life.

items.title: Ethical Practices
items.description: We follow strict ethical guidelines and never prioritize profit over the well-being of our dogs.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Open communication with families about our breeding practices, health records, and puppy development.

items.title: Lifetime Support
items.description: We're here for you and your puppy throughout their entire life with guidance, support, and care.

ourDogs.description: Meet the wonderful parents behind our beautiful puppies. Each dog has been carefully selected for their exceptional health, temperament, and conformation.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.description: Hear from the families who have welcomed our puppies into their homes

reviews.name: Sarah & Michael
reviews.text: We couldn't be happier with our puppy from Poodle & Co. The entire process was professional, caring, and transparent. Our little one is healthy, happy, and has the sweetest temperament!

reviews.name: Jennifer L.
reviews.text: The care and attention to detail is remarkable. They truly love their dogs and it shows in every interaction. Our poodle is not just a pet, but a beloved family member.

reviews.name: David & Emma
reviews.text: From the first inquiry to bringing our puppy home, the experience was wonderful. The breeder was always available to answer questions and provided excellent support.

reviews.name: Rachel M.
reviews.text: Our poodle has brought so much joy to our lives. The health guarantee and ongoing support have been invaluable. Highly recommend Poodle & Co. to anyone looking for a quality breeder.

reviews.name: Tom & Lisa
reviews.text: We did extensive research before choosing a breeder, and Poodle & Co. exceeded all our expectations. Our puppy is smart, healthy, and perfectly socialized.

reviews.name: Amanda K.
reviews.text: The transparency about health testing and breeding practices gave us complete confidence. Our poodle is everything we hoped for and more!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our puppies or want to schedule a visit, we're here to help.

footer.description: Dedicated to ethical breeding practices and finding loving homes for our beautiful poodles.
